name: Pet of the Week – Henry
description: Meet Henry, this week's Pet of the Week! Henry is a calm and loving domestic shorthair cat who gets along well with other cats and is looking for a forever home to lounge in.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet Henry, this week’s Pet of the Week! Henry is a calm and loving domestic shorthair cat who gets along well with other cats and is looking for a forever home to lounge in. If you’re interested in adopting Henry, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
